posts.post_content:
Bought these from a buddy and just trying to break even on them.  Price is firm for now as I will break them up if need be.  For now I just have a scan of the Johnson.  The group will arrive to me in a day or two and I can get any additional scans if anyone would like.  If you claim this group, no need to pay until I receive them.

$871 shipped and insured for the group

Includes:

T205 Johnson SGC 10
1933 Goudey Paul Waner PSA 1
1933 Goudey Lindstrom SGC 1.5
1940 Play Ball Chance Superman back PSA 2
T206 Fielder Jones SGC A

Sold


Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk
